content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, very close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's negotiate the rental price. I'm aiming for the highest possible amount, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive with its central location and modern amenities. I'm looking for a place that not only meets my needs but also offers good value for money. I'm a student, and I'm willing to pay a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment. Could you please tell me more about the pricing you have in mind?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest, Yi-Nuo Wang. As I mentioned, I'm aiming for the highest possible price. Considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I would like to rent it for 2000 Euros per month. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your asking price is significantly higher than what I had anticipated. While I understand the appeal of the location and the quality of the apartment, I must consider my budget as a student. Could we possibly negotiate a lower price that aligns better with my financial circumstances?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad you brought up your financial situation, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, my asking price is based on the apartment's location and quality. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm not looking for a significant reduction. How about 1800 Euros per month? It's a decent reduction, but it's the lowest I can go considering the apartment's value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1800 Euros per month is still quite high for my budget as a student. I'm grateful for your willingness to negotiate, but I'm looking for a price that reflects both the quality of the apartment and my financial constraints. Is there any further room for discussion on the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your financial constraints, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I must also consider the value of my property. Let's meet somewhere in the middle. How about 1500 Euros per month? It's a fair price that takes into account both your financial situation and the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1500 Euros per month is more reasonable, and it aligns better with my budget as a student. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on finding a price that suits both our needs. Would it be possible to discuss any additional fees or utilities that I should be aware of?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for agreeing to the price of 1500 Euros per month, Yi-Nuo Wang. As for additional fees or utilities, the monthly rent covers the cost of water and sewage. However, you will be responsible for electricity and internet, which you can arrange with the respective service providers. I hope this clarifies your expenses. If you have no further questions, I propose that we proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm pleased with the agreed-upon price of 1500 Euros per month, and I understand the terms regarding additional utilities. I have no further questions at this time. Let's proceed with the rental agreement. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
